donate_desc_long: If you like this module and want to support its further development, you can do so on Boosty.
launcher_clear_all_desc:
Adds a button to close all applications in the multitasking menu (Recents).

Supports multiple display modes for integration into the stock interface.
launcher_ca_margin_desc: Adjusts the vertical position of the floating button. The value is a multiplier of the standard margin.
xposed_required_message: This feature requires Xposed module to be active.
reboot_confirm_system_msg: The device will be rebooted immediately. Save your work before proceeding.
reboot_confirm_sysui_msg: SystemUI will be restarted. Navigation bar, status bar and notifications will briefly disappear.
launcher_search_feed_subtitle: Configure native search and Google Feed
launcher_clear_all_nav_subtitle: Customize the clear all button behavior
launcher_gestures_subtitle: Double tap to sleep and more
launcher_recents_menu_subtitle: Configure Carousel, Scaling, Blur and more
recents_disable_live_tile_desc: Forces snapshot instead of live view
recents_blur_overflow_desc: Apply to entire card instead of just thumbnail
grid_desc_dock_icons: Number of icons in the dock bar (0 = system default).
grid_desc_dock_hide_text: Hides icon labels in the dock.
grid_desc_home_icon_size: Adjusts the size of icons on the home screen (100% is standard).
grid_desc_drawer_icon_size: Adjusts the size of icons in the app drawer (100% is standard).
grid_desc_dock_icon_size: Adjusts the size of icons in the dock (100% is standard).
grid_desc_text_mode: How icon labels are displayed when text is visible.
quickstep_warning_text: This feature completely replaces the native Quickstep recents view with a custom implementation. It may cause visual glitches or crashes. Use at your own risk. Disable this option if you experience issues.
quickstep_engine_summary: Replace native recents with custom implementation
quickstep_engine_info: Enables a fully custom recents view with different visual styles and animations. This bypasses the stock Pixel Launcher recents completely.
quickstep_style_minimal_desc: Small cards with app icons only
